biotools.summary: Tool for the functional profiling of genome-scale experiments oriented to the interpretation of microarray experiments. As part of the Babelomics suite, the tool finds differential distributions of biological terms (GO, KEGG pathways, Interpro motifs, Transfac motifs, CisRed motifs, etc.) between two groups of genes.

bioschemas.name: FatiGOplus
